mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS id, a.master_id AS masterId, a.week AS week, a.start_time AS startTime, a.end_time AS endTime FROM order_combination_frequency a where a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} AND a.master_id = #{masterId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_combination_frequency( id, master_id, week, start_time, end_time, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{masterId}, #{week}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
